1.verse: John Da Baptiza Teach - You wen hear da story bout Jesus? He da Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He Godʼs Boy. Dis da time da Good Kine Stuff Bout Christ wen start happening.

2.verse: Isaiah, da guy who wen talk fo God long time ago, he wen write dis inside da Bible: “God say, listen! I goin send my messenja guy. He going ahead a you An he goin get everyting ready Befo you come, Cuz you my real Spesho Guy, you know.

3.verse: Inside da boonies, My messenja guy goin talk real loud an real strong So everybody can hear: ‘Eh! Make da road ready fo da Good Boss Up Dea! Make um strait fo him!’ ”

4.verse: Dat time da guy John wen show up inside da boonies, baptizing da peopo. He stay teaching, “You guys gotta come sorry an like pau do all da bad kine stuff you stay doing now, an no do um no moa. Den God goin let you guys go an hemo all yoa shame. Dass why I stay baptize peopo.”

5.verse: All da peopo from Judea side an Jerusalem town, dey wen go da boonies fo hear John. Dey wen tell um strait out all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an he wen baptize um inside da Jordan River.

6.verse: You know, Johnʼs clotheses come from da camel hair. He wen make one rope outa leather fo belt. He eat grasshoppas, an he get honey from da bees.

7.verse: Dis wat he tell um, “Afta me, goin come one nodda guy. He get mo power den me. An you know wat? I not even importan nuff fo go down an help him hemo his slippa from his foot.

8.verse: I baptizing you guys wit water, but da way he goin baptize you guys, he goin give you Godʼs Good an Spesho Spirit fo take ova you.”

9.verse: John Baptize Jesus - Dat time, Jesus come from Nazaret town, Galilee side, an John wen baptize him inside da Jordan River.

10.verse: Right den Jesus wen come up outa da water. An you know wat? Jesus wen see da sky broke open, an wen spock Godʼs Spirit coming down on top him, jalike one dove.

11.verse: An wow! Had one voice from da sky wen say, “You my boy! I really get love an aloha fo you, an I stay good inside cuz a you!”

12.verse: Da Devil Try Make Jesus Do Bad Kine Stuff - Right afta dat, Godʼs Spirit wen make Jesus go inside da boonies.

13.verse: Had wild animals ova dea. Jesus, he wen stay dea forty days. Da Devil try presha him fo make him do bad kine stuff, but he neva. An had angel messenja guys from God dat wen come an take care him.

14.verse: Jesus Start Fo Teach Galilee Side - Latas, King Herod wen throw John Da Baptiza Guy inside da prison. Afta dat, Jesus go Galilee side, an he tell da peopo da Good Stuff From God.

15.verse: He tell, “Time awready! God stay King hea now. You guys gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you guys doing, an no do um no moa. An da Good Stuff From God I telling you guys, you guys gotta believe um!”

16.verse: Jesus Tell Four Fisha Guys Fo Come Wit Him - Dat time Jesus stay walking by Galilee Lake, an he spock Simon an his brudda Andrew. Dey throwing dea net inside da water, cuz dey fisha guys.

17.verse: Jesus tell um, “Eh you guys! Come wit me! Be my guys! Da way you guys bring in da fish, I goin teach you guys how fo bring in peopo fo be my guys too!”

18.verse: Right den an dea, dey wen leave dea nets an go wit him.

19.verse: Going from dea, he spock James an his brudda John. Zebedee dea fadda. Dey inside da boat fixing dea nets.

20.verse: Right den an dea he tell um fo come wit him. Dey go way from dea fadda Zebedee who stay inside da boat wit da workas, an dey go wit Jesus.

21.verse: Jesus Make One Bad Kine Spirit Let Go One Guy - Jesus an his guys, dey wen go Capernaum town. On da Jewish Rest Day, dey go inside da Jewish church. Jesus start fo teach da peopo.

22.verse: Wat he teach um wen blow dea minds! Cuz he teach wit plenny power, not like da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules, an dem guys no mo power.

23.verse: Get one guy inside da Jewish church wit one bad spirit dat wen take ova him. Right den an dea he wen yell,

24.verse: “Ho! You Jesus from Nazaret! Wat you like do to us? Why you wen come ova hea? Fo wipe us out? I know who you! You da Good An Spesho Guy from God!”

25.verse: Jesus wen scold da spirit, “Shut yoa mout! Let go da guy!”

26.verse: Den da bad spirit wen shake up da guy plenny. Da spirit wen yell real loud, an let go da guy.

27.verse: Da peopo, wen blow dea minds. Dey tell each odda, “Eh! Wass dis?! Wat kine new teaching dis? Dis guy, he get power! He even tell da bad kine spirits wat fo do, an dey do um!”

28.verse: Right den an dea, da peopo wen go all ova Galilee side, fo tell everybody bout Jesus.

29.verse: Jesus Make Plenny Sick Peopo Come Good - Right den an dea Jesus dem wen go outside da Jewish church, an dey go inside Simon an Andrewʼs house. James an John go too.

30.verse: Simonʼs mudda-in-law get feva. Simon dem tell Jesus, “Eh, her sick, you know.”

31.verse: Jesus go an take her by da hand an pull her up. Right den da feva wen pau, an her wen give dem food.

32.verse: Wen da sun go down, an da Rest Day pau, da peopo bring all da sick peopo an da peopo who get bad spirits da wen take ova dem.

33.verse: All da peopo from da town was jamming outside da house.

34.verse: Jesus wen make plenny peopo who get all kine sick come good. He make all da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, an he tell da spirits, “No talk!” cuz dey know who him.

35.verse: Jesus Pray An Teach All Ova Galilee - Early in da morning, wen starting fo get light, Jesus wen get up an go outa da house. He go one place wea neva have nobody, an pray ova dea.

36.verse: Simon dem wen go look fo him.

37.verse: Dey find him, an dey tell, “Eh, everybody stay looking fo you, you know!”

38.verse: But he say, “Neva mind! We gotta go da odda towns aroun hea, cuz I gotta teach dea too. Dass why I wen come.”

39.verse: So, he teach inside all da Jewish churches all ova Galilee, an make all da bad kine spirits let go da peopo.

40.verse: Jesus Make One Lepa Guy Come Good - Had one lepa guy wen go by Jesus, an go down in front him an beg him. He say, “If you like, you can make me come good so I can go wit da odda peopo fo pray, yeah?”

41.verse: Jesus wen look at him, an he pity him. He touch da guy, an say, “Okay, I do um. Come good.”

42.verse: Right den an dea da lepa guy come good. No mo lepa!

43.verse: Jesus wen talk strong to da guy. He tell um, “Eh! You betta not tell nobody bout dis! Go, let da priest guy check you out. No foget make da kine sacrifice now, jalike Moses wen tell inside Godʼs Rules. Den everybody goin know dat you stay good now.” Den he tell um fo go.

44.verse: Jesus wen talk strong to da guy. He tell um, “Eh! You betta not tell nobody bout dis! Go, let da priest guy check you out. No foget make da kine sacrifice now, jalike Moses wen tell inside Godʼs Rules. Den everybody goin know dat you stay good now.” Den he tell um fo go.

45.verse: But da guy, he go outside an tell everybody wat wen happen to him. So, Jesus no can stay inside da towns, but he gotta stay outside inside da boonies. An da peopo, dey stay come from all ova da place fo hear him.

1.verse: Jesus An One Guy Dat No Can Move - Afta couple days, Jesus wen go back Capernaum wea he wen stay befo. Da peopo wen hear dat Jesus stay home now.

2.verse: So, plenny peopo wen come togedda an neva have room. No can even go near da door. An Jesus teach um.

3.verse: Some guys wen come by Jesus. Four a dem wen carry one guy dat no can move.

4.verse: Get so plenny peopo, dey no can bring him near Jesus. So dey wen go up on top da flat roof, an make one big puka inside da roof, right ova da place wea Jesus stay. Dey put da guy on top his mat an put um down real slow in front Jesus.

5.verse: Wen Jesus see dat, he wen tink, “Eh, wow! Dis guys trus me fo real kine, dat I goin make dea friend come good!” Den he tell da guy, “Eh, my boy, you know all da bad kine stuff you wen do befo? I tell you now, da shame from all dat, pau awready!”

6.verse: But get some teacha guys dea dat teach Godʼs Rules. Dey stay tinking,

7.verse: “Eh! Who dis guy tink he is fo talk lidat! He talking stink bout God! Ony God can let da guy go an hemo da shame from da bad kine stuff!”

8.verse: But right den Jesus wen know inside wat dey tinking. He say, “How come you guys tinking bad kine stuff lidat?

9.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I like show proof you guys, dat I get da right inside dis world, fo let da peopo go an hemo da shame dey get fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout throwing out da shame -- anybody can talk lidat. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stand up an move aroun!’ -- anybody can talk lidat. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy make strong.” Dass why he tell da guy,

10.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I like show proof you guys, dat I get da right inside dis world, fo let da peopo go an hemo da shame dey get fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout throwing out da shame -- anybody can talk lidat. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stand up an move aroun!’ -- anybody can talk lidat. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy make strong.” Dass why he tell da guy,

11.verse: “Eh, get up! Take yoa mat an go home awready!”

12.verse: So da guy wen get up, pick up da mat an go outside in front all dem. Dat wen blow dea minds big time. Dey say, “Dis unreal! Dis neva happen befo. Dis God, he awesome!”

13.verse: Jesus Tell Levi Come Wit Him An Be His Guy - Jesus wen go by da lake. Plenny peopo come by him, an he wen teach um.

14.verse: He was walking, an he wen spock Levi. (Leviʼs fadda name Alfeus.) Levi stay by da tax place collecting money fo da govermen. Jesus tell him, “Eh! Come wit me! Be my guy!” Levi get up, an go wit him.

15.verse: Jesus wen go Leviʼs house fo eat. Had plenny guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen an odda guys dat get bad name jalike dem, dat like hang out wit Jesus. Dey all dea, eating wit Jesus an his guys.

16.verse: Had some Pharisee guys dea dat teach Godʼs Rules. Dey see Jesus dea eating wit all da tax guys an odda kine peopo dat get bad name jalike dem. So, dey aks Jesus guys, “Eh, yoa teacha, how come he eating wit da tax guys an odda kine peopo dat get bad name?”

17.verse: Jesus wen hear dat, an he tell dem, “Da peopo dat not sick, dey no need docta, ony da sick guys need. Me, I neva come fo tell da good kine peopo fo come by me fo be my guys, but da peopo dat get bad name.”

18.verse: How Come Jesus Guys No Skip Food So Dey Can Pray? - Now, Johnʼs guys an da Phariseeʼs guys was skipping food so dey can pray. Some peopo come aks Jesus, “How come John Da Baptizaʼs guys an da Pharisee guys skip food so dey can pray, but da guys you teaching, dey no skip food, but still yet dey can pray?”

19.verse: Jesus tell dem, “Wat you tink? You go one wedding an skip food, wen da guy dat getting married stay dea? Nah!

20.verse: Bumbye, da time goin come wen dey goin take away da guy dat getting married. An den, dass wen his friends goin skip food.

21.verse: Da Old Kine Teaching An Da New Kine Teaching - “Fo fix up one old puka clothes, you no goin take one new piece cloth dat no shrink yet fo cover da puka. You go do dat, den wen you wash um, da new piece goin shrink plenny an make one mo bigga puka, an you make da old clothes mo worse.

22.verse: An same ting, you no put grape juice fo make wine inside one old kine leather bag, an close um fo let um ferment. You do dat, da new wine goin come mo big an bus da wine bag, an da wine goin spill out. Da old leather no good no moa. Mo betta, you put new wine inside new kine leather bag.”

23.verse: Dey Give Jesus Hard Time Bout Da Rest Day - Anodda time was da Jewish Rest Day. Jesus an his guys walk thru da wheat fields. Da guys pick litto bit wheat fo eat.

24.verse: But had Pharisee guys ova dea dat wen tell Jesus, “Hala! Dese guys, you teaching dem, but still yet dey stay doing da kine stuff dey not suppose to on da Rest Day!”

25.verse: Jesus tell um, “Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat David wen do wen him an his guys was hungry?

26.verse: Wen Abiatar was da Head Priest, David go inside Godʼs house an eat da bread dass spesho fo God. But no can do dat kine, cuz Godʼs Rules say dat ony da priest guys can eat dat bread. But David, he give um to his guys too, an nobody say notting.”

27.verse: Den Jesus wen tell, “You know, God neva make da peopo fo da Rest Day. He make da Rest Day fo da peopo.

28.verse: Dass why I da One dat get da right fo say wat can do da Rest Day, cuz I da Guy Dass Fo Real.”

1.verse: One Guy, His Hand Stay All Wasted - One nodda time Jesus wen go inside da Jewish church. Had one guy dea, his hand stay all wasted.

2.verse: Get some guys dea. Dey was checking out Jesus real good, if he go make da guy come good on da Rest Day, cuz dey like poin finga him.

3.verse: So Jesus say to da guy wit da wasted hand, “Eh, come hea in front everybody!”

4.verse: Den Jesus say to da peopo, “So, wat? Da Rules say you can do good kine stuff on da Rest Day, o you can do bad kine? Wat you suppose to do, kill peopo, o help um? Wat da Rules say, aah?” But da Pharisee guys, dey neva have notting fo say.

5.verse: Jesus look at all da peopo real good. He stay real huhu. Same time, he feel sad cuz dey hard head. Den he say to da guy, “Stick out yoa hand.” An da guy stick um out, an da hand wen come good.

6.verse: But da Pharisee guys, dey ony like stick wit dea rules. Dey wen go outside, an right den an dea dey go talk to King Herod guys, how dey goin kill Jesus.

7.verse: Jesus Teach Da Peopo By Da Lake - Den Jesus an his guys, dey wen go way, an stay by da lake. Plenny peopo from Galilee wen go wit him. An get peopo from Judea,

8.verse: Jerusalem, Idumea, from da odda side da Jordan River, from Tyre side, an Sidon side. Dey all come cuz dey hear all da kine stuff Jesus stay doing.

9.verse: Get so plenny peopo, Jesus wen tell his guys fo make ready one boat, so he can go inside um an den da peopo no can squash him.

10.verse: Jesus wen make plenny sick peopo come good. Dass why all da odda sick peopo dea, dey go all out fo touch him.

11.verse: Had peopo ova dea wit bad kine spirits dat wen take ova dem. Weneva dey see Jesus, dey go down in front him, an yell, “You Godʼs Boy!”

12.verse: But Jesus wen tell da spirits, “You guys betta not tell nobody who me”.

13.verse: Da Twelve Guys Jesus Send - Den Jesus wen go to da hills. He tell da guys he like pick, “Eh, come!” An dey wen come.

14.verse: He wen pick twelve guys. He say, “I like you guys stay by me. I like teach you guys. Latas I goin send you guys all ova da place, an den you guys goin teach da peopo.

15.verse: An I goin give you guys power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo too.”

16.verse: Dis da twelve guys he wen pick fo send all ova da place: Simon, da guy Jesus wen call “Peter,”

17.verse: James an his brudda John, Zebedeeʼs boys. He call um “Da Thunder Guys,” cuz dey da kine guys dat like make big noise.

18.verse: Andrew, Philip, Bartolomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alfeusʼs boy James, Taddeus, Simon da Jewish Sovereignty guy,

19.verse: an Judas Iscariot. He da guy dat goin set up Jesus fo mahke bumbye.

20.verse: Jesus An Da Bad Kine Spirits Boss - Den Jesus wen go home. Plenny peopo wen come, jalike befo time, so Jesus an his guys no can eat.

21.verse: Wen Jesus ohana hear dat, dey wen go fo take him away. Dey say, “He wen go pupule!”

22.verse: Some teacha guys who teach Godʼs Rules wen come from Jerusalem. Dey say, “Dis guy, da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits wen take ova him fo shua! Beelzebul, you know! Dass why he can make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo!”

23.verse: Jesus tell dem, “Eh, you guys, come ova hea! I like teach you guys someting. You tink da Devil goin make his own guys let go da peopo, aah? No way!

24.verse: Da ohana dat go agains each odda no can stay strong. Da country dat go agains each odda ony bus up itself.

25.verse: Da ohana dat go agains each odda no can stay strong. Da country dat go agains each odda ony bus up itself.

26.verse: If da Devil make his own guys let go da peopo, den he going agains himself! He no can stay strong. He goin wipe out!

27.verse: So, no good how you guys tinking! How you tink one guy goin bus inside one big mokeʼs house an rip off his stuffs, if he no tie up da moke first? Den can steal everyting.

28.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: God can let da peopo go an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey doing, even if dey talk stink God.

29.verse: But if dey talk stink Godʼs Spesho Spirit, God no take dat. So if dey talk lidat, God no goin let um go an hemo dea shame fo dat, not now o eva!”

30.verse: Jesus say all dat cuz da teacha guys wen say, “He get one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova him.”

31.verse: Jesus Mudda an Bruddas - Den Jesus mudda an bruddas come. Get plenny peopo sitting aroun him, so his mudda an bruddas stay outside. Dey wen send one guy inside fo get him. Da peopo tell him, “Eh, yoa mudda an yoa bruddas an sistas, dey outside, an dey like talk to you.”

32.verse: Jesus Mudda an Bruddas - Den Jesus mudda an bruddas come. Get plenny peopo sitting aroun him, so his mudda an bruddas stay outside. Dey wen send one guy inside fo get him. Da peopo tell him, “Eh, yoa mudda an yoa bruddas an sistas, dey outside, an dey like talk to you.”

33.verse: He tell um, “Wat you guys tink? Who my mudda? Who my bruddas?”

34.verse: He look all da guys sitting aroun him, an say, “Look! Hea, dese guys my mudda! An dese guys, dey my bruddas an sistas, fo real kine!

35.verse: Whoeva do wat God like, dey my brudda an sista an mudda!”

1.verse: Da Story Bout Da Farma Dat Plant Seed - Anodda time Jesus wen teach by da lake. Plenny peopo wen come aroun him, so he go inside one boat, an sit down dea. Da boat stay inside da lake. Da peopo, dey stay standing on da beach.

2.verse: He use plenny stories fo teach um. Dis wat he say:

3.verse: “Listen! You guys wen hear da story bout da farma guy?

4.verse: He go throw seeds fo plant. Some fall down by da trail, an da birds go eat um up.

5.verse: Some fall down on top da rocks wea had ony litto bit dirt. Da plants grow up fast, no matta ony litto bit dirt dea.

6.verse: But wen da sun come up, da plants dry up, cuz no mo root.

7.verse: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da kine bushes wit thorns. Da bushes grow up, an choke um, so no mo wheat.

8.verse: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey grow up good, an come up plenny. Some seed, dey give back thirty times moa, some odda seed give back sixty times moa, an some seed even give back hundred times moa.”

9.verse: Jesus say, “If you guys hear dis, den listen!”

10.verse: How Come Jesus Teach Wit Stories? - Wen Jesus stay by himself wit da peopo who stay dea, an da twelve guys he was teaching, dey wen aks him wat da stories mean.

11.verse: So he say, “God let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay King. But da odda peopo on da outside, I teach um wit stories.

12.verse: Dass fo make happen jalike Isaiah wen tell dat God say, ‘Dey see wat I stay do, but dey no can see fo real. Dey hear wat I say, but dey no can hear fo real. If dey really wen see an hear, Den dey goin change, An I goin let um go an hemo dea shame Fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do.’ ”

13.verse: Wat Da Story Mean - Jesus aks dem, “You guys no undastan dis story? Den how you guys goin undastan da odda stories?

14.verse: “Da farma plant da seed. He jalike da guy dat tell wat God say.

15.verse: “Da seed dat fall down by da trail, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say, an right den an dea da Devil come an make da guy so he no can rememba wat he wen hear.

16.verse: “Da seed dat fall down on top da rocks, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say, an right den an dea he stay plenny good inside.

17.verse: But da guy, he jalike da plant dat no mo root inside him. He stick wit um fo litto wile. But wen get trouble, o wen da peopo make him suffa cuz he wen trus da stuff he wen hear, da guy give up right den an dea.

18.verse: “Da seed dat fall down inside da kine bushes wit thorns, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say,

19.verse: but bumbye da guy worry bout all da stuffs he need hea inside dis world. He like come rich, an all dat throw him off. So all dat stuff choke out all da tings God say dat was inside him. He no can do da right tings, jalike one wheat plant dat no can give wheat, growing inside da kine bushes wit thorns.

20.verse: “Da seed dat fall down inside da good dirt, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say an trus um. He do da right tings, jalike da good plant dat give wheat. All da good stuff da guy do, he do um thirty times moa, some guys do um sixty times moa, an some odda guys hundred times moa.”

21.verse: Da Lamp On Top Da Shelf - Den Jesus aks dem, “Eh, try tell me dis. You bring da lamp fo cover um up? O you put um unda da bed? Nah! You goin put um on top da shelf so you can see, yeah?

22.verse: Kay den, wateva you no undastan now, you goin undastan bumbye.

23.verse: If you guys hear dis, den listen!”

24.verse: He tell um dis too: “Tink real good bout wat you hear. If you do dat, God goin give you even mo fo know.

25.verse: If you guys undastan all da kine stuff, den God goin tell you moa. But if you guys no like know all dat stuff, den God goin make you no rememba even da litto bit you know now.”

26.verse: Nobody Know How Da Seeds Grow, But Dey Grow - Jesus tell um anodda story. He say: “Wen God stay King, dass jalike one farma dat throw da seed all ova da groun.

27.verse: Nite an day, no matta he sleep o get up, da plant goin poke da head up from da groun an goin grow, even if da guy donno how.

28.verse: Da dirt no need nobody fo help um make da wheat. First da stalk come, den da head, den da food inside da head.

29.verse: Wen da wheat come ripe, da farma cut um wit da sickle, cuz dey stay ready.”

30.verse: Da Story Bout Da Mustard Seed - Jesus tell um anodda story. “God, he stay King. Wat story I can tell you guys so you guys can undastan?

31.verse: Wen God stay King, dass jalike one mustard seed. Dat seed mo small den all da odda seeds, you know. If get one guy plant um inside his field,

32.verse: an da seed grow, da plant come mo big den all da odda plants in da garden. Da branches so big, da birds from da sky can sit on top um in da shade!”

33.verse: Jesus Ony Teach Dem Wit Stories - Jesus teach da peopo wit plenny stories lidat. He ony tell dem stuff dey can undastan.

34.verse: He neva teach dem odda stuff, ony wit stories. But every time he wen stay ony wit da guys he teaching, he tell dem wat da stories mean.

35.verse: Jesus Make Da Storm Pau - Dat time afta da sun go down, Jesus wen tell his guys, “Eh, we go da odda side da lake.”

36.verse: Dey wen leave all da peopo, an Jesus guys take him inside da boat. Had odda boats dea too.

37.verse: Den had one big storm ova dea, an da waves was bussing ova da boat, so da boat almos wen huli.

38.verse: But Jesus still yet stay sleeping in da back on one pillow. His guys wen go wake him up, an tell him, “Eh, Teacha! You no care we goin mahke, o wat?”

39.verse: Jesus get up, an scold da wind an da waves. He say, “Quiet! No move aroun!” Den da wind wen pau an da waves wen come nice.

40.verse: An he tell his guys, “How come you guys scared? You guys no trus me, o wat?”

41.verse: Dey so scared, dey wen tell each odda, “Eh, wat kine guy dis? Even da wind an da waves do wat he tell um!”

1.verse: Jesus Make One Guy Wit Bad Kine Spirits Come Good - Afta dat, Jesus dem go da odda side da lake wea da Gerasa peopo stay.

2.verse: Wen Jesus was getting outa da boat, one guy dat get one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova him wen come from da grave yard.

3.verse: He everytime stay inside da grave yard. Da bad spirit wen make him so strong, nobody can tie him up, not even wit chains.

4.verse: Befo, dey wen tie da guyʼs hand an feet plenny times wit da chains, but he wen bus um. Nobody stay strong nuff fo hold da guy down.

5.verse: Nite an day, da guy everytime yelling from da grave yard, an da hills, an cutting himself wit stones.

6.verse: Wen he see Jesus far away, he wen run an go down in front him.

7.verse: Jesus tell him, “Let go da guy, you bad kine spirit you!” Da guy wen yell real loud, “Wat you like do to me, Jesus? Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, you his Boy! Promise to God you no goin make me suffa!”

8.verse: Jesus tell him, “Let go da guy, you bad kine spirit you!” Da guy wen yell real loud, “Wat you like do to me, Jesus? Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, you his Boy! Promise to God you no goin make me suffa!”

9.verse: Den Jesus wen aks him, “Eh, wat yoa name?” An da bad kine spirit tell him, “My name ‘Army,’ cuz us guys, we uku paila spirits!”

10.verse: An da spirit beg Jesus plenny times, “Eh, no send us outa dis place!”

11.verse: On da odda side da hill, get one big pig farm, an da pigs was grinding.

12.verse: Da bad kine spirits wen beg Jesus, “Send us inside da pigs! We like take ova dem.”

13.verse: Jesus tell um, “Go!” So da bad spirits wen let go da guy, an go take ova da pigs. Had bout two tousand pigs ova dea. An you know wat? All da pigs wen run down one steep hill an fall ova da cliff inside da lake, an drown inside da water.

14.verse: Den da pig farmas wen run, an go inside da town an all da place aroun dea, telling everybody wat wen happen. All da peopo from da town wen go fo see.

15.verse: Wen dey come by Jesus, dey spock da guy dat befo get da uku paila bad kine spirits dat wen take ova him. He look diffren now. He all dress up, an not pupule no moa. So da peopo real scared.

16.verse: Da odda guys who wen see wat wen happen, dey tell da peopo wat wen happen to da guy wit da bad kine spirits an da pigs.

17.verse: Den da peopo, dey start fo beg Jesus fo go way from dea.

18.verse: Wen Jesus climb inside da boat, da guy dat da bad kine spirits wen take ova befo time, he say, “Try let me go wit you.”

19.verse: But Jesus tell, “No. Go home to yoa ohana, an tell um all da good kine stuff da Boss Up Dea wen do fo you. He wen pity you an give you chance.”

20.verse: So da guy go way, an tell everybody in da Ten Towns wat Jesus wen do fo him. An wat he tell all da peopo, wen blow dea minds.

21.verse: Jairus, Da Leada Guy - So den, Jesus wen come back in da boat to da odda side da lake. An plenny peopo wen come aroun him wen he still near da lake.

22.verse: One leada guy from da Jewish church name Jairus wen come dea. He spock Jesus, an wen go down on his knees by Jesus feet

23.verse: an beg him plenny, “Eh, my litto girl, her ony twelve years old, an her stay going mahke. Try come an put yoa hand on top her, so she can come good an stay alive!”

24.verse: So Jesus wen go wit Jairus. An all da peopo wen go wit Jesus. Dey so plenny, dey wen push aroun him.

25.verse: Jesus Wen Make One Sick Wahine Come Good - Get one wahine wit da peopo. Her was bleeding fo twelve years.

26.verse: Her wen suffa plenny, no matta plenny doctas wen try make her good. Her wen spend all her money, but her neva come good. Her come mo worse.

27.verse: Her wen hear bout Jesus, so her come in back a him wit all da peopo aroun him, an her touch his clotheses.

28.verse: Her tinking, “If I can ony touch his clotheses, I goin come good again.”

29.verse: Right away her bleeding wen pau, an her wen feel inside her dat she no mo suffa.

30.verse: Right den an dea, Jesus wen feel power go outa him. He wen turn aroun an look all da peopo. He tell, “Eh, who wen touch my clotheses?”

31.verse: His guys say, “How come you say dat? Get uku paila peopo pushing aroun you. But you go aks who touch you?”

32.verse: Jesus stay looking aroun fo see who wen touch him.

33.verse: Den da wahine, she wen know wat wen happen to her. She so scared, she shaking. She wen go down by his feet, an wen tell him da whole story.

34.verse: An Jesus wen tell her, “Eh sista, you wen trus me. Dass why you come good. Go now, yoa heart goin rest inside. You no suffa no moa.”

35.verse: Jesus Make Jairus Girl Come Good - Jesus still talking, an some guys wen come from Jairus house, da leada guy fo da Jewish church. Dey tell him, “Yoa litto girl wen mahke! Mo betta you no bodda da teacha no moa.”

36.verse: But Jesus neva listen to dem. He tell Jairus, “No scared. Ony trus me.”

37.verse: He ony let Peter, James, an James brudda John, go wit him.

38.verse: Dey wen come Jairus house. Jesus see all da peopo an hear um making big noise an crying.

39.verse: He go inside an tell, “Eh, how come you guys making big noise an crying? Da girl neva mahke, her ony sleeping.”

40.verse: An dey wen laugh at him. So he wen chase um all outside, an take da girlʼs fadda an mudda, an his three guys, an dey go inside da room wea da girl stay.

41.verse: He take da girlʼs hand an tell her, “Talita kum.” Dat mean, “Eh! Litto girl, get up!”

42.verse: Eh, right den an dea her wen stand up, an walk aroun. An da peopo, right den an dea, dea jaws wen drop.

43.verse: Den he wen tell um, “You guys betta not tell nobody bout dis! Now, go make her someting fo eat.”

1.verse: Da Nazaret Peopo, Dey No Mo Respeck Fo Jesus - Jesus go way from dea, an go back his own place Nazaret, an his guys go too.

2.verse: Wen da Rest Day come, he go inside da Jewish church an teach. Plenny peopo wen say, “Wow! Wea he get all dis stuff from? How come he know all dis? Wea he get power fo do all dis awesome stuff?

3.verse: Dass da carpenta, yeah? His mudda Mary, an his bruddas James, Joseph, Judas, an Simon. His sistas, dey stay hea wit us too.” Dis wen bodda dem, how he stay ack.

4.verse: But Jesus tell um, “One guy who talk fo God get plenny respeck. But he no mo respeck notting inside his own town an his own ohana.”

5.verse: An Jesus wen tink, “Eh, how come dey no trus me?” Az why he neva do awesome stuff ova dea fo show his power. He put his hands on top litto bit peopo, an make dem come good. Da Twelve Guys Jesus Send - So Jesus wen go odda small towns, teaching odda peopo.

6.verse: An Jesus wen tink, “Eh, how come dey no trus me?” Az why he neva do awesome stuff ova dea fo show his power. He put his hands on top litto bit peopo, an make dem come good. Da Twelve Guys Jesus Send - So Jesus wen go odda small towns, teaching odda peopo.

7.verse: He call his twelve guys togedda, an send um out two by two. He give um da power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo.

8.verse: Dis wat he wen tell his guys: “Ony take litto bit fo da trip, ony yoa walking stick. No take bread. No even take one bag, o money in yoa belt.

9.verse: Take yoa slippas, but no take two coats.

10.verse: Wen you guys go inside one guyʼs house, stay dea till you go way from da town.

11.verse: An if da peopo in da place no like you come an no like listen to you, wen you go outa dat town, dust yoa feet, fo show dat you no mo dust from dat no good place.”

12.verse: Afta dat Jesus guys all wen go out an tell da peopo, “You gotta be sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an no do um no moa.”

13.verse: An dey wen make plenny bad kine spirits let go da peopo, an put olive oil on top plenny sick peopo, an make um come good.

14.verse: John Da Baptiza Guy Wen Mahke - Dat time, King Herod, he wen steal his brudda Philipʼs wife Herodias, an marry her. But John Da Baptiza Guy stay telling him, “You not suppose to steal yoa bruddaʼs wife.” So Herod wen bus John an throw him in jail. Herodias stay nuha wit John, an wen like kill him, but she no can. Herod, he scared John, az why. He know dat John one guy who everytime do da right ting, cuz he all out fo God. Dass why Herod no let nobody hurt John. Wen Herod wen listen to John, he come all mix up, but still yet he like listen to him. An den, Herodʼs birfday time wen come. Herod wen go throw one big lu‛au. He wen tell all da high makamaka guys from his palace, da army officers, an all da leada guys from Galilee fo come. Herodiasʼs girl wen come inside da place an dance, an Herod an all da odda guys wen like da dance. So King Herod tell da girl, “Eh, wateva you like, I swear to God I goin give um to you. I even give you half a everyting I get cuz I da king!” She wen go out an aks her mudda, “Wat I goin aks fo?” An da mudda wen tell her, “Go aks fo John Da Baptiza Guyʼs head!” So da girl wen go inside real fast by da king an tell him, “I like you give me John Da Baptiza Guyʼs head on top one big plate right now!” Da king wen come real sorry. But cuz he wen swear to God in front all his friends, he neva like say no. So right den an dea he tell da guard fo go cut off Johnʼs head an bring um. Da guy wen go cut off his head inside da jail, an bring um on top da big plate, an give um to da girl. An she wen give um to her mudda. Den da guys John wen teach, dey hear bout dat, an dey come, an take his body an put um inside one tomb. Latas King Herod hear bout all da stuff Jesus stay doing, cuz everybody wen hear bout him. Some peopo was saying, “John Da Baptiza Guy wen come back alive. Dass why dis guy Jesus get power inside him fo do all dis awesome kine stuff.” Some odda peopo wen say, “Nah, he Elijah.” An odda peopo wen say, “He one nodda talka fo God, jalike da guys who wen talk fo God long time ago.” But wen King Herod hear dat, he say, “Eh, I wen tell my guys fo go chop off Johnʼs head. But now he stay come back alive!”

Herod, he scared John, az why. He know dat John one guy who everytime do da right ting, cuz he all out fo God. Dass why Herod no let nobody hurt John. Wen Herod wen listen to John, he come all mix up, but still yet he like listen to him. An den, Herodʼs birfday time wen come. Herod wen go throw one big lu‛au. He wen tell all da high makamaka guys from his palace, da army officers, an all da leada guys from Galilee fo come. Herodiasʼs girl wen come inside da place an dance, an Herod an all da odda guys wen like da dance. So King Herod tell da girl, “Eh, wateva you like, I swear to God I goin give um to you. I even give you half a everyting I get cuz I da king!” She wen go out an aks her mudda, “Wat I goin aks fo?” An da mudda wen tell her, “Go aks fo John Da Baptiza Guyʼs head!” So da girl wen go inside real fast by da king an tell him, “I like you give me John Da Baptiza Guyʼs head on top one big plate right now!” Da king wen come real sorry. But cuz he wen swear to God in front all his friends, he neva like say no. So right den an dea he tell da guard fo go cut off Johnʼs head an bring um. Da guy wen go cut off his head inside da jail, an bring um on top da big plate, an give um to da girl. An she wen give um to her mudda. Den da guys John wen teach, dey hear bout dat, an dey come, an take his body an put um inside one tomb. Latas King Herod hear bout all da stuff Jesus stay doing, cuz everybody wen hear bout him. Some peopo was saying, “John Da Baptiza Guy wen come back alive. Dass why dis guy Jesus get power inside him fo do all dis awesome kine stuff.” Some odda peopo wen say, “Nah, he Elijah.” An odda peopo wen say, “He one nodda talka fo God, jalike da guys who wen talk fo God long time ago.” But wen King Herod hear dat, he say, “Eh, I wen tell my guys fo go chop off Johnʼs head. But now he stay come back alive!”
